project.name: ADM Developer tasks - GLASSFISH
project.description: This buildfile is used to start/stop glassfish domains, e.g. integration-bes or example domain

target.name: BesDomain.STOP
target.description: Stops the BES domain, the domain name is defined in oscm-devruntime/javares/local/HOSTNAME/integration.properties

target.name: BesDomain.START
target.description: Starts the BES domain, the domain name is defined in oscm-devruntime/javares/local/HOSTNAME/integration.properties

target.name: BesDomain.RESTART
target.description: Restarts the BES domain, the domain name is defined in oscm-devruntime/javares/local/HOSTNAME/integration.properties

target.name: IndexerDomain.STOP
target.description: Stops the indexer domain, the domain name is defined in oscm-devruntime/javares/local/HOSTNAME/integration.properties

target.name: IndexerDomain.START
target.description: Starts the indexer domain, the domain name is defined in oscm-devruntime/javares/local/HOSTNAME/integration.properties

target.name: ExampleDomain.STOP
target.description: Stops the example domain, the domain name is defined in oscm-devruntime/javares/local/HOSTNAME/integration.properties

target.name: ExampleDomain.START
target.description: Starts the example domain, the domain name is defined in oscm-devruntime/javares/local/HOSTNAME/integration.properties

target.name: AppDomain.STOP
target.description: Stops the APP domain, the domain name is defined in oscm-devruntime/javares/local/HOSTNAME/integration.properties

target.name: AppDomain.START
target.description: Starts the APP domain, the domain name is defined in oscm-devruntime/javares/local/HOSTNAME/integration.properties

target.name: All.STOP
target.description: Stops all domains, the domain names are defined in oscm-devruntime/javares/local/HOSTNAME/integration.properties

target.name: All.START
target.description: Starts all domains, the domain names are defined in oscm-devruntime/javares/local/HOSTNAME/integration.properties
